WRITING.TITLE: James Loveridge: Funny Because It's True - (FULL SHOW)

WRITING.TEXT: [You're crazy...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DvOHbxBAEN8)
"You seeing two or I gotta stop drinking?"
My mate's bar has a copy of this. I regularly get drunk and play it until the early hours.

I was grounded after a fight at school and my parents decided I wasn't allowed computer games for a whole month and I'd literally just bought Ocarina Of Time. Seeing that cartridge sitting there and not being able to play it was murder. I still think of that time as one of the hardest parts of my youth.

WRITING.TITLE: My Mum caught a fish and I have never seen an animal look so depressed.

WRITING.TEXT:
**UPDATE!**
Hey guys so it's finally come to an end and I've listened to over 5 hours of solid insults. It's been a crazy couple of days but in a weird way I enjoyed it. Some of the insults were hilarious and I can't wait to talk about it on stage some time.
To all those who have entered but not had their response I've promised I will eventually get through them all and I will but now instead of calling me every hour of the god damn day I can now call up the number to receive my insults (ironically at a cost to myself but a promise is a promise) So it will be slower but I will get through them eventually.
To all those who left a message thanks so much for taking part and I hope this little prank cheered you up in some way and finally to u/lordmatthew aka Matt who built the site... I owe you buddy. I owe you big!
Thanks everyone and maybe catch you soon.
James Xx
Thanks mate
Kat I fucking love you!
Seriously? GODAMMIT MATT! /u/lordmatthew I'm going to dick kick you so hard next I see you.
Thank you Hannah, my ego has taken a pasting in the last 24 hours
That's pretty funny

Oh for fucks sake really? That wasn't part of the deal. The site keep crashing and it's the site that manages all the calls so I can't receive the insults and knock the timer down and until the timer hits 0 calls can be added to the overall total.
Essentially I'm fucked!
I honestly don't know anymore.
I've agreed with Matt that I'll take the calls regardless. Feel it's only fair everyone who sends one gets a response.
Yeah I'll do the full shift
Not even when an ex called at 3am to say I have a tiny cock! Hahaha
Yep
You too dick cheese :)
I'm sure I will, some of these messages are amazing.
Yeah this is Matt the guy who built the site. He's ~~an evil genius~~ a dick.
Cheers :)
This is why we can't have nice things!
Well that makes one of us
You got a problem mate you know where to send it :)
The website may have crashed a little from all the traffic.
Quite a few Loveridge gypsy folk in the UK
Haha pleased you're having fun
I've had a few of those
Matt who built it doesn't respect old browsers
haha ok will do. Although the site has crashed so it's taking a while to come through
Jesus christ I'm going to be answering these all night...
Ah thanks mate, I did gig in Sydney a while back but if I do the Adelaide festival I'll post it on my website...my real website. lol
Haha it's ok. I'm still relatively upbeat. :)
Why, which one were you?
I liked this one
Haha yeah just kidding, pleased you laughed. I oddly enjoying the random nature of the insults. Thankfully I'm not taking any of them personally yet.
Haha, I was planning to go to a gig tonight but I think my evening is just going to be sitting next to phone and being called a cunt by strangers to world over.
Yeah but which insult did you put?
Which insult were you?
I appreciate it, I can only be called a cunt so many times in a day :)

WRITING.TITLE: Without my knowledge or consent a friend created the most elaborate prank website I've ever seen. A 24/7 insult hotline directly to my phone that I cannot turn off. (Description on the website)
Why is the modern take on 'the illuminati' such a popular conspiracy and what about it makes people genuinely believe that Jay Z and Queen Elizabeth are in cahoots? aka Make people go 'full retard'
WRITING.TEXT: I know there are loads of ridiculous conspiracies out there but this one I find particularly baffling as you see so many websites and internet comments from people who genuinely believe Jay Z, the pope, Lady Gaga and the Queen are part of a secret brotherhood and are manipulating everyday life. What about this conspiracy makes so many people go full retard?

**James Loveridge Comedy Blog**
[Having Fun With Scammers](http://www.jamesloveridgecomedy.co.uk/2014/07/10/having-fun-with-scammers/)
As a comedian I get a lot of spam mail and scammers contact me. This is a blog post about how I have fun dealing with them.

WRITING.TITLE: Reddit, what is the most pathetic 'Dick Measuring' contest you've ever been caught in?
WRITING.TEXT: By this I mean an argument you've been unwillingly drawn into where you try to outdo someone over something arbitrary or uncool. i.e. Boasting to someone about your internet speed or the type of car you drive.
I've met her a few times and she is one of the most insane people I've ever met. Really nice and fun but just fucking crazy.
Haha, it's the only way.

Yeah I did find it odd, I guess that's more for instant re-posts. So you think I should take this down? I haven't seen it and I spend an unhealthy amount of time watches videos online, so it's safe to assume that not every person on reddit has seen it and as such some people may enjoy it.

Well would you look at that. I had no idea. Although when I posted the video Reddit didn't notify me that it'd already been posted so I thought it was all good.
Ah well, I'd never seen this before so I'm going to leave it up.
So you stopped it because the phrasing meant it lacked the academic merit initially eluded to in the introduction? You seriously weren't curious of the spectacle of the crash regardless?
